Articles.Content: I can't seem to find the propellers that just got added.

Welcme to the forums KSP lover5!

Have you purchased the Breaking Ground DLC?

 

Thread moved to Gameplay Questions.

Yeah, sorry. The standard base game doesn't have propellers -- just jet engines. It is possible (but difficult) to build bearings and then to fake up some engines to rotate things on the bearings, if you really really want to. The new props are in some downloadable content that also includes robotics that you can purchase.

Edited July 24, 2019 by bewing
If you do have the parts, you make the propeller yourself by mounting blades on one of the rotating mechanisms.

On 7/24/2019 at 3:46 PM, KSP lover5 said:

I can't seem to find the propellers that just got added.

As folks have mentioned, you have to buy Breaking Ground to get these.

If you already have Breaking Ground, you'll find the rotors (i.e. the motorized hub) in the robotics category, and the propeller blades under aero surfaces.
